mapper.select: SELECT TA.ALERT_ID, TA.ALERT_TYPE, TA.ALERT_OBJECT_ID, TA.CONTENT, TUI.USER_NAME, TA.RECEIVER_ID, TA.ALERT_DT, TA.READ_YN FROM T_ALERT TA LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO TUI ON TUI.USER_ID = TA.SENDER_ID WHERE TA.RECEIVER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_ALERT TA LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO TUI ON TUI.USER_ID = TA.SENDER_ID WHERE TA.RECEIVER_ID = #{userId} AND TA.READ_YN = 'N'
